rdf:Description.dc:title: Lost-time claims and claim rates ... summary 1986

Alberta. Alberta Occupational Health and Safety.
Alberta. Alberta Labour. Information Services.

Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Alberta Community and Occupational Health
rdf:Description.dc:description: 2005 issue has supplement: "Disabling injuries and modified work claims 2005."

Topics covered include injury and disease analysis, industry sectors: agriculture, mining, forestry, manufacturing and processing, construction, transportation, communication, utilities, retail, wholesale, public administration, education, health services, business, personal and professional services, occupational fatalities accepted by WCB.
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat Reader.
Issued by: Alberta Occupational Health and Safety, 1988-1992; Alberta Labour, Information Services, 1993-1997; by Alberta Human Resources and Employment, 1988-2005.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Industrial accidents
Workers' compensation
